name: Zen Toolkit
author: themeszen

sections.description:
Zen Toolkit is a companion for arenabiz WordPress theme by ThemesZen
This plugin adds slider section , about section, portfolio section and testimonial on home page in the arenabiz theme, that adds extra funtionality and features to arenabiz WordPress theme. You need to download and install arenabiz theme.

Get free support at https://themeszen.com/contact-us/

Changelog ==:

= 1.0.1 – Fixed: Changes as requested by TRT.

1.0.2 – Fixed: Changes madein zen-toolkit file.

1.0.3 – Fixed: Changes madein zen-toolkit file for new uncover theme.

1.0.4 – Fixed: Assets folder added.

1.0.5 – Fixed: New Assets folder added.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server (in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory).
  2. Activate the zen Toolkit plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
What is the plugin license?

  • This plugin is released under a GPL license.

What themes this plugin supports?

  • The plugin currently only supports arenabiz theme.

More from us:
How to start a blog
